scripts.client: cd ../client && cross-env NODE_ENV=development BROWSER=none PORT=3000 npx react-scripts start
scripts.copy_nm: cpx ../client/node_modules2/**/* ../client/node_modules && cpx ./node_modules2/**/* ./node_modules && echo Обновления к NPM модулям для построения приложения скопированы!
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run copy_nm" "npm run serve" "npm run client"
scripts.prod: concurrently "npm run copy_nm" "npm run start" "npm run client"
